description: This file is a PHP script for editing Dynamic DNS (DDNS) configuration entries within a web-based network management interface. It includes PHP code for processing user input, fetching existing configuration data, and rendering an HTML form with embedded JavaScript for client-side validation and dynamic form behavior.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Dynamically adds a new hostname input field to the form with a remove button.

methods.name: add1
methods.description: Removes a hostname input field from the form.
